question: How do I fix authentication failures after password reset?
reference_answer: Clear all active sessions and force re-authentication after password change. Ensure SAML signature algorithms match between your app and IdP (SHA-256 recommended). Extend session timeout to 2 hours with activity-based renewal to prevent premature logouts. Implement automatic session cleanup on password change.

question: What causes database connection timeout errors?
reference_answer: Database connection pool was sized too small for peak load. Increase max_connections parameter, add connection pooling monitoring, and optimize long-running queries that hold connections.

question: Why do international credit card payments fail?
reference_answer: Payment gateway configuration was missing international card processing flag. Enable international transactions in gateway settings and add country-specific currency conversion.

question: App crashes on iOS 17, how to fix?
reference_answer: iOS 17 deprecated certain networking APIs. Update URLSession implementation to use new async/await pattern and remove deprecated NSURLConnection usage.

question: Memory leak in background worker process
reference_answer: Add explicit cursor.close() calls and implement context managers for all database operations to prevent memory leaks. Optimize N+1 queries using JOIN statements, add database indexes on frequently queried columns, and implement Redis caching for aggregate statistics to improve performance.

question: Emails not being delivered to users
reference_answer: Email service provider blacklisted sending IP due to spam complaints. Implement SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records, switch to dedicated IP address, and add email deliverability monitoring.

question: Search returns no results even with valid queries
reference_answer: Elasticsearch index had corrupted shards. Delete corrupted index, rebuild from database, and implement automated daily index health checks and backup strategy.

question: File upload fails for large files
reference_answer: Nginx configured with default 1MB request body size limit. Update nginx.conf to set client_max_body_size to appropriate value and increase Node.js Express body-parser limit.

question: How to fix users hitting API rate limits?
reference_answer: Increase rate limit for authenticated users and implement tiered rate limiting based on account type. Add X-RateLimit headers to API responses. Migrate to centralized Redis cache shared across all servers to ensure consistent data and implement cache invalidation via pub/sub.

question: Dashboard loading very slowly
reference_answer: Dashboard was making N+1 queries. Implement query optimization using JOIN statements, add database indexes on frequently queried columns, and introduce Redis caching for aggregate statistics.

question: Scheduled reports not generating
reference_answer: Disk space was full on reports server. Implement automated cleanup of old reports, increase disk space, and add disk usage monitoring alerts.

question: Webhooks timing out intermittently
reference_answer: Increase timeout to 30 seconds, implement exponential backoff for retries, add webhook delivery status dashboard, and persist failed webhooks to dead letter queue.

question: Users getting logged out too frequently
reference_answer: Extend session timeout to 2 hours for active users with activity-based session renewal. Add auto-save for forms with localStorage backup and implement session expiry warning. Clear all active sessions and force re-authentication on password changes to prevent stale tokens.

question: CSV export files are corrupted
reference_answer: Change to UTF-8 with BOM for Excel compatibility, add proper escaping for special characters in CSV fields, and include character encoding in filename.
